# filter from subset 

imgs <- clf %>% 
  filter(name == "dirty",
         value > 0.95) %>% 
  # create the pointer to the thumb
  mutate(img = sprintf('![](./thumbs/thumb_%s)', file_name)) %>% 
  select(img) 

# make it two cols << very inelegant fiddling!
data.frame(col1 = imgs[1:78,], col2 = c(imgs[79:155,], "")) %>% 
  kable(caption = "'dirty' - confidence score > 0.95")
